TopicTitle: I need some help with installing

Articles.Content: In 0.17 I haven't seen the plugins folder in the files.

Sesni, the Plugin folder is usually created when you unzip an add-on into the ksp_win folder, or you can create it yourself if you prefer, it should look like this:

C:\Games\KSP_win\Plugins

Aha! Thanks.

EDIT : I suppose you make the "Source" Folder (In-Deed!)

Edited September 30, 2012 by Sesni
